name: Throw Shoes at Mike Milbury
description: You know him, you hate him, now you can throw shoes at him! Mike Milbury is famous for throwing shoes at someone else, now you can throw them right back! Embark on a never ending journey to get the high score and see how many Mike Milburys you can hit with a shoe. If you'd like to support us in our game development endeavors, download Puzzled Penguin on your mobile device or tablet, and look out for our next game coming soon! (Other games are much more serious than this one) Follow us on twitter @HardSoftGames and like our facebook page of the same name. Thanks for playing!
